name: ANT-i Flames
description:
A game made in 13 hours for the 2 week long Game-Jam LOWREZJAM 2022.

You're a kid, you have a magnifier and there's an ant nest... And it's a sunny day. Let's burn them!

HOW TO PLAY

  • WASD to move
  • Space to burn
  • Don't let the ants reach the bottom!

MODIFIERS

The ants can't move for 5 secondsThe ants will be pushed upYour sight will be "blinded" for 3 seconds

Game made by NaOH

Music: Cyberpunk Moonlight Sonata by Joth
